title: Equation for HCl added to HNO2-KNO2 buffer

content.prompt: A student prepares a solution by combining 100 mL of 0.30 M HNO2(aq) and 100 mL of 0.30 M KNO2(aq). Which of the following equations represents the reaction that best helps to explain why adding a few drops of 1.0 M HCl(aq) does not significantly change the pH of the solution?

skill.text: 5.E: Determine a balanced chemical equation for a given chemical phenomenon.
